definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: We now know that X-ray waves are 2,000 to 10,000 times shorter than light waves.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在知道X光波比光波短二千到一万倍。

sentences.english: Lenses change the vergence of light waves.
sentences.chinese: 透镜可以改变光波的聚散度。

sentences.english: The heater, mainly used for civil light wave furnace.
sentences.chinese: 民用的主要用于加热器，光波炉。

sentences.english: Radar waves go through clouds or fog quite well, whereas light waves do not.
sentences.chinese: 雷达波能很容易地穿云破雾，而光波则不能。

sentences.english: To cause beating by superposing waves of different frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 使光波分裂成两束平行的垂直偏振的波。

sentences.english: However, optical internetworking directly based optical wavelength has its intrinsic defects.
sentences.chinese: 然而，基于光波长通道的直接联网有它特有的局限性。

sentences.english: The technology of All Optical Wavelength Converter (AOWC) is one of the key technologies in DWDM system.
sentences.chinese: 全光波长变换技术是DWDM系统中的一项关键技术。

sentences.english: Propagation of the light-wave is just the same as that of the sound-wave;
sentences.chinese: 光波的传播和声波一样存在多普勒效应。

sentences.english: Intermediate knowledge of Lightwave as well as basic knowledge of After Effects are required to complete this tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 光波中级知识以及对基本知识后，必须完成本教程。

sentences.english: It also describes the related optical singal processing and optical wavelength changer technology.
sentences.chinese: 再说明其相关的光信号处理和光波长转换技术。

sentences.english: A new tapered multimode interference (MMI)-based coherent lightwave combiner is reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道了一个新的基于锥形多模干涉的相干光波合波器。

sentences.english: It represents the instantaneous traces of the ordinary and extraordinary wavefronts.
sentences.chinese: 它表示寻常光波前和非常光波前的瞬时轨迹。

sentences.english: It represents the instantaneous traces of the ordinary and extraordinary wavefronts.
sentences.chinese: 它表示寻常光波前和非常光波前的瞬时轨迹。

sentences.english: The wine shows beautiful and bright ruby robe. Fine and perfumed with red fruits aromas.
sentences.chinese: 泛着如红宝石长袍般的光波，细腻如香水的红果子香。

sentences.english: In a laser beam, all the waves have the same wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 镭射光中，所有光波的波长都一样。

sentences.english: The large fusion body is constructed from a variety of light waves that fuse together.
sentences.chinese: 大型融合体，是从融合的各种不同光波中构建出来的。
